Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 75th/Lakefront
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, South Shore, 76th, Coles and 75th, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
